Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Data link transmission errors. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
